moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Thunder Wave
moves.description: A weak electric charge is launched at the target. It causes paralysis if it hits.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Howl
moves.description: The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, boosting its Attack stat.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Spark
moves.description: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Odor Sleuth
moves.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit with Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Bite
moves.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.

moves.name: Thunder Fang
moves.description: The user bites with electrified fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

moves.name: Roar
moves.description: The target is scared off and replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

moves.name: Discharge
moves.description: A flare of electricity is loosed to strike the area around the user. It may also cause paralysis.

moves.name: Charge
moves.description: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. It also raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Wild Charge
moves.description: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. It also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Thunder
moves.description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.
